ID: CV0W4VR_00
From: Tarun Gulati <Tarun.Gulati@levelshoes.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Sujith Stephen <Sujith.Stephen@chalhoub.com>; Kristina Tokieva <Kristina.Tokieva@levelshoes.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-03 15:46
Subject: Accident claim request from Insurance - MFC
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop,

 

We had an accident at MFC yesterday (2nd June 2025), an external delivery vehicle hit security barrier and damaged.

 

This was reported to Dubai police same time, Attached police report and repair quotation FYR.

 

Kindly confirm to proceed for repair and let us know when claimed from insurance.

So we can allocate the reimbursement under same BU and GL.

 

Looking forward for your kind support.

 

Regards,

TARUN GULATI	
SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO	
	
LEVELSHOES.COM
	
 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/> 	
CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <http://www.chalhoubgroup.com/>
